task.title: Restrict Access to your Personal Information
task.shortdesc: Restrict access to your personal information in MyPack Portal.

context.p: To restrict access to your personal information in MyPack Portal, follow these steps:

step.info: the Privacy Restrictions tab from the left-hand navigation menu

step.note: If you want to clear the restriction on a directory field, select the Clear checkbox.
step.info: the Restrict checkbox next to the information you want to restrict

result.p: Your personal information should now be restricted in your account according to your choices.
